channel.title: Unable to play on ANY 508/525 Client?
channel.description:
Hey everyone.
Every time I try to load a 508/525 client, I get this:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
What is it and how can I fix it? Thanks in advance :)

item.title: Unable to play on ANY 508/525 Client?
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

He means make the word client start with a lowercase c. -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to play on ANY 508/525 Client?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“AP Exams, post:3, topic:391827”]I thought it couldn’t find Client.class. But it’s there, so I don’t know. I googled it and some others had the same problem, but no one really knew how to help.

Any ideas?[/quote]

Class names are case-sensitive.
